# Features used in Word

* macros
* running headers and footers with page numbers
* styles
* tables and figures with captions and cross-referencing
* cite as you write
* last saved by and date/time stamp
* sections for portrait and landscape
* spell (and grammar) checking
* tables of contents
* tracked changes
* 

# notes
bibtek for references


```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
